item.title: Benefits of Olive Oil in Skincare: Why It’s a Must-Have Ingredient
item.description: Benefits of Olive Oil in Skincare: Why It’s a Must-Have Ingredient Olive oil has been used for centuries as a natural skin remedy, and for good reason. It’s packed with antioxidants, vitamins, and essential fatty acids that hydrate, heal, and protect the skin. That’s why it’s a key ingredient in tallow balm NZ, helping to create a lighter, smoother texture while boosting skin health. 1. Deep Hydration Without Clogging Pores ✔ Rich in squalene → A natural skin-identical compound that keeps moisture locked in.
